meanings.definition: A type of sugar molecule found in RNA.
meanings.sent1: Riboses are important for building RNA strands.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study riboses to understand how RNA functions.
meanings.sent3: The riboses in RNA are like the sweet sprinkles on a scientific cupcake.
meanings.sent4: In the recipe of life, riboses are the essential sugar ingredient.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, riboses look like tiny sugar beads strung together.
